description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Bean Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mexican Bean Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Split the buns in half horizontally. Top the bottom halves of the buns with some lettuce and a spoonful of salsa. Place the burgers on top and finish with a spoonful of guacamole. Cover with the top halves of the buns.
